nodes.documentation:
A mixin that is selling tokens from a preallocated pool
 * - Tokens have precreated supply "premined"
 * - Token owner must transfer sellable tokens to the crowdsale contract using ERC20.approve()
 * - The mixin does not implement buy entry point.
nodes.name: AllocatedCrowdsaleMixin

nodes.documentation: @param _beneficiary The account who has performed approve() to allocate tokens for the token sale.
nodes.name: AllocatedCrowdsaleMixin

nodes.documentation: Called from invest() to confirm if the curret investment does not break our cap rule.
nodes.name: isBreakingCap

nodes.documentation: We are sold out when our approve pool becomes empty.
nodes.name: isCrowdsaleFull

nodes.documentation: Get the amount of unsold tokens allocated to this contract;
nodes.name: getTokensLeft

nodes.documentation:
Transfer tokens from approve() pool to the buyer.
   * Use approve() given to this crowdsale to distribute the tokens.
nodes.name: assignTokens
